name: Six Puzzle
description:
Game Description: Challenging the hexagonal elimination games make people can't stop at all.

Game Features:Simple design, no colourful picture in, join the light sound effects, no time limit, is that you spend time of choice!

Playing Method: Players with their own wisdom to the bottom of the screen randomly appear arbitrary placement of three squares in hexagon chess, horizontal or diagonal to line up a complete a row or column, you can achieve eliminate score; To eliminate the more the more, combo, the higher the score.
In addition, the game support center, to play list with players around the world!
